content: The Swift Bat is hidden in a secret cave in Yellow Wind Ridge. To find it, make your way to the First Prince of Flowing Sands boss arena. On the opposite side of the arena, you will find a wooden plank leading to another area. Pass over the plank and head down to find a small crack in the wall. Interact with the crack to squeeze through and end up in the den of the Swift Bat.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Swift_Bat_Spirit.md", within the section "Swift Bat Spirit" and the sub-section "Swift Bat Location". The content is presented below:

The Swift Bat is hidden in a secret cave in Yellow Wind Ridge. To find it, make your way to the First Prince of Flowing Sands boss arena. On the opposite side of the arena, you will find a wooden plank leading to another area. Pass over the plank and head down to find a small crack in the wall. Interact with the crack to squeeze through and end up in the den of the Swift Bat.
